body_html:
I have this issue as well.
MacOS using an external GPU.
DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH is set (to /usr/local/cuda/lib)
/usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.8.0.dylib exists

It works when I disable SIP. But something turns SIP on on a regular basis. Annoying.

body:
I have this issue as well.
MacOS using an external GPU.
DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH is set (to /usr/local/cuda/lib)
/usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.8.0.dylib exists

It works when I disable SIP. But something turns SIP on on a regular basis. Annoying.
